akn:section.akn:heading: Biological research activity of Survey; review and report by National Academy of Sciences

akn:content.akn:p: § 31j. Biological research activity of Survey; review and report by National Academy of Sciences Beginning in fiscal year 1998 and once every five years thereafter, the National Academy of Sciences shall review and report on the biological research activity of the Survey. (Pub. L. 104–208, div. A, title I, § 101(d) [title I], Sept. 30, 1996, 110 Stat. 3009–181, 3009–189.)
